name: BIconInput
sample: <BIconInput id={documentTypeId} as='url' onChange={this.handleFileInputChange.bind(this)} titleText='Application Icon' buttonText='Chose Icon'>

infoArray.name: as
infoArray.desc: What format the BIconInput should read the file as (i.e., buffer, binary, url, text). Defaults to url.

infoArray.name: id
infoArray.desc: Specifies a unique id for an HTML element (the value must be unique within the HTML document).

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: If children is passed into FileReaderInput, then the component will hide the native file input and instead display children. Whenever the custom children are clicked, the component will trigger the native file input prompt. This allows complete control over styling an display.

infoArray.name: addButtonText
infoArray.desc: Indicates the add button title text.

infoArray.name: clearButtonText
infoArray.desc: Indicates the clear button title text.

infoArray.name: value
infoArray.desc: Indicates the current image path value.

infoArray.name: defaultValue
infoArray.desc: Indicates the default image path value for non-value assigned status.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the file selection has changed.
